columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The id of KMS encryption key used by Amazon Security Lake to encrypt the Security Lake object.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) created by you to provide to the subscriber.

columns.name: create_status
columns.description: Retrieves the status of the configuration operation for an account in Amazon Security Lake.

columns.name: replication_role_arn
columns.description: This parameter uses the IAM role created by you that is managed by Security Lake, to ensure the replication setting is correct.

columns.name: s3_bucket_arn
columns.description: Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) uniquely identify Amazon Web Services resources.

columns.name: replication_configuration
columns.description: Provides replication details of Amazon Security Lake object.

columns.name: lifecycle_configuration
columns.description: Provides lifecycle details of Amazon Security Lake object.

columns.name: update_status
columns.description: The status of the last UpdateDataLake or DeleteDataLake API request.
